title: bitcorati
author: bitcorati
content: Haven't posted here in a looooooog time, but been in crypto since the early days (2012).Just joined the team at Botanix because I absolutely LOVE what they are building - an EVM on top of Bitcoin!If you've ever wanted to develop web3 apps on Bitcoin or trade BTC on Bitcoin (Bitcoin DeFi). I feel our approach is the most "native" approach.The Crypto Dog agrees >> https://twitter.com/TheCryptoDog/status/1727647065625575561Jameson Lopp is also interested >> https://blog.lopp.net/an-introduction-to-spiderchain/
